pgTitle: List of World War I films

rows.text: A young girl lies about being engaged to a pilot

The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse

German infantry on the Western Front

US pilot on the Western Front
In a frontier town alternatively occupied by the Austrians and the Russians, a Polish woman joins a hotel as a maid to seek revenge on the Austrian officer that caused her sister's suicide.
The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
American infantry on the Western Front

Sveti Georgije ubiva aždahu (Свети Георгије убива аждаху)
Das weisse Band – Eine deutsche Kindergeschichte (German)
